# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, this product is worth more than $1500000 to you. I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1200000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a premium price, tailored to meet your specific needs. I look forward to discussing how this product can revolutionize your business processes. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
